name.description: The name of the item tag, which acts as an identifier that matches the value parameter of the u-tabbar
name.description_zh: item标签的名称，作为与u-tabbar的value参数匹配的标识符

icon.description: uView has a built-in icon or an image of an absolute path
icon.description_zh: uView内置图标或者绝对路径的图片

badge.description: A corner sign in the upper right corner indicates the information
badge.description_zh: 右上角的角标提示信息

dot.description: Whether or not to display a dot will override the badge parameter
dot.description_zh: 是否显示圆点，将会覆盖badge参数

badgeStyle.description: To control the position of the logo, as an object or as a string, you can set the top and right attributes
badgeStyle.description_zh: 控制徽标的位置，对象或者字符串形式，可以设置top和right属性

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the option is toggled

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the option is toggled
